```{r setup, include=FALSE}

#load libraries

library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(readxl)

#view data

str(protein)

```

#EDA all treatments

```{r}
#all treatments

ggplot(protein, aes(x= temp, y= protein_mg_cm2, fill= salinity)) +
      geom_boxplot() +
      #scale_fill_manual(values = c("#EE6363","#B3EE3A","#EE4363")) +
      facet_wrap(species~gulf, scales = "fixed")+
      theme(legend.position = "none") +
      theme(panel.border = element_rect(color = "black", fill = NA)) +
      theme_classic()+
      theme(text = element_text(size = 14))
```
